chat_history.message:
Hello,

My iPhone 13 has a problem:

I haven't liked how the iPhone 13 takes photos because you can't turn off HDR in any way since it comes preinstalled in the system.

Thank you,
When the seller receives the package, they have 3 business days (5 business days for laptops and home appliances) to repair or replace the product, or 2 business days to process a refund if necessary.
The customer must meet the following requirements for the return to be processed:
✔ Confirms that the device has not been opened by a third party, exposed to water, or suffered an impact or fall
✔ Confirms that they have deleted their personal data
✔ Has confirmed that they have the return label.
✔ Understands that all accessories and proof of purchase must be included in the return package.
✔ Understands that they have 14 days to use the return label.
Remember: once delivered, the seller has 3 business days (5 business days for laptops and home appliances) to repair or replace the article and 2 business days to process a refund if necessary.

Dear Backcare,

The refund request has been processed.

Regards,
TB
